text:
Microsoft stop messing with my people's task bar settings. Microsoft stop messing with my people's task bar settings. Search is back with a "people" link on desktops where they had disabled search after the October updates. To remove the search box from the taskbar in Windows 10, you can follow these steps: 1. Right-click on an empty space on the taskbar.
 2. Select Taskbar settings.
 3. Scroll down to the Taskbar items section.
 4. Toggle the switch next to Search to Off. -- %4060a58536.com

metadata.topic: Microsoft stop messing with my people's task bar settings.
